    ps_3_0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xy
    dcl_color_pp v1.w
    dcl_2d s0
    texld_pp r0, v0, s0
    mul_pp oC0.w, r0.w, v1.w
    mov_pp oC0.xyz, r0

// approximately 3 instruction slots used (1 texture, 2 arithmetic)
